availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Connell (Louisville, Kentucky, justice of the peace)

body.p: Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky, justice of the peace. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah Raymond Connell in Bullitt County, Kentucky on June 28, 1823. Father of Louisa Connell, Nancy Connell, William L. Connell, James M. Connell, David H. Connell, Thomas Connell, Martha J. Connell, Angelina Connell, and Laura A. Connell. Carpenter in Louisville in 1850. Magistrate in Louisville in 1860. Justice of the peace in Louisville in 1864.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, District 1, p. 48A.

Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Bullitt County Marriages, Film #000482690, p. 38.
